CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Task (
  id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  projectId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  taskType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  status INT NOT NULL,
  startTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  endTime TIMESTAMP NULL,
  completedCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  modelInfo TEXT NOT NULL,
  language VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'zh-CN',
  detail TEXT DEFAULT '',
  note TEXT DEFAULT '',
  createAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updateAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES Projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE INDEX idx_task_projectId ON Task(projectId);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS GaPairs (
 id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 projectId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 fileId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 pairNumber INT NOT NULL,
 genreTitle VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 genreDesc TEXT NOT NULL,
 audienceTitle VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 audienceDesc TEXT NOT NULL,
 isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
 createAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
 updateAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
 PRIMARY KEY (id),
 FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES Projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
 FOREIGN KEY (fileId) REFERENCES UploadFiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
 UNIQUE (fileId, pairNumber)
);

CREATE INDEX idx_gapairs_projectId ON GaPairs(projectId);
CREATE INDEX idx_gapairs_fileId ON GaPairs(fileId);
ALTER TABLE Questions ADD COLUMN gaPairId VARCHAR(255) NULL;

ALTER TABLE Questions ADD FOREIGN KEY (gaPairId) REFERENCES GaPairs(id) ON DELETE SET NULL;

CREATE INDEX idx_questions_gaPairId ON Questions(gaPairId);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CustomPrompts (
  id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  projectId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  promptType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  promptKey VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  language VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  createAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updateAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES Projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  UNIQUE (projectId, promptType, promptKey, language)
);

CREATE INDEX idx_customprompts_projectId ON CustomPrompts(projectId);
CREATE INDEX idx_customprompts_project_type ON CustomPrompts(projectId, promptType);
CREATE INDEX idx_customprompts_project_language ON CustomPrompts(projectId, language);
ALTER TABLE Datasets ADD COLUMN aiEvaluation TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DatasetConversations (
  id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  projectId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  questionId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  question TEXT NOT NULL,
  chunkId VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  model VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  questionLabel VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  score REAL DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  aiEvaluation TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
  tags TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
  note TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL,
  scenario TEXT NOT NULL,
  roleA TEXT NOT NULL,
  roleB TEXT NOT NULL,
  turnCount INT NOT NULL,
  maxTurns INT NOT NULL,
  rawMessages TEXT NOT NULL,
  confirmed BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updateAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (id),
  FOREIGN KEY (projectId) REFERENCES Projects(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE INDEX idx_datasetconversations_projectId ON DatasetConversations(projectId);
